Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER occurs out of all completed reimbursement cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER in variants that eventually lead to Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER that are immediately followed by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of times Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER appears in process variants containing Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER relative to the total occurrences of Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of cases with Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER that originate from a resubmission after Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Number of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER activities associated with case amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER that occur before Request Payment without any intermediate rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER compared to the frequency of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of variants containing Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER that also contain Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER at any point
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Ratio of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER activities in cases that eventually result in Payment Handled
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER in cases where the budget owner and supervisor are different persons (inferred from presence of both approval steps)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER that directly follow Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION without intervening rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER in variants that do not include any rejection activity
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities

Name: Number of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER events per year (2017 vs 2018)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER that are part of the most frequent successful path: Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION → Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER → Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR → Request Payment → Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER that are not preceded by any rejection activity
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER occurring in variants that include more than one approval step before supervisor final approval
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER activities in variants that start with a resubmission after any type of rejection
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities
